title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Online Learning Perception Surveys and Cultural Impact Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience or foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain factors influencing their perception of online learning environments (instructor characteristics, social presence, instructional design, credibility).
Learners can analyze cross-cultural/gender differences in online learning perceptions through survey data.
Learners can propose culturally contextualized improvements for online education based on research findings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
